name: 1Code
tagline: Open source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code
description: Whats 1Code? An app to run your Claude Code agents in parallel that works on Mac and Web. On Mac - run locally, with or without worktrees. On Web - run in remote sandboxes with live previews of your app, mobile included, so you can check on agents from anywhere. Running multiple Claude Codes in parallel dramatically sped up how we build features.

name: Boom video for Mac
tagline: Present live, record your screen, look pro on camera
description: Boom is the video app for coaches, creators, and founders who present on camera. Present live on Zoom, Meet, or Teams with pro layouts and cinematic transitions. Record tutorials, demos, and courses that are finished when you stop talking. Switch scenes on the fly with Stream Deck support. A simple OBS alternative and Loom alternative with virtual camera and webcam enhancements built in. No editing. No timeline. No post-production. Mac only. Built by a small indie team.

name: TranslateGemma
tagline: Open translation on Google models, supporting 55 languages
description: TranslateGemma is a new suite of open AI translation models built on Googleâ€™s Gemma 3. It enables high-quality communication across 55 languages, combining strong accuracy with exceptional efficiency. Designed to run on mobile, local devices, and cloud environments without compromising performance.

name: Dynamic Content by beehiiv
tagline: Now you can tailor a single newsletter for every reader
description: Dynamic Content lets you personalize your emails by showing different content to different readers, all within a single send. Thereâ€™s no code, no custom templating, and no extra complexity â€” it's all available right inside the beehiiv editor.

name: Stracti
tagline: Build AI game bots with no code required
description: Stracti is a no-code AI automation platform for building and running bots visually. Create bots using the web, desktop, or mobile client, then run them locally through the desktop app. Stracti uses screen-based AI detection instead of APIs, making it ideal for real-world workflows. Full control, clear action history, and reliable automationâ€”without black-box behavior.

name: ChatGPT Translate
tagline: Translate with ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT Translate is a web-based AI translation tool that instantly converts text between over 50 languages while keeping meaning, context, and tone intact. You can type, paste, speak, or upload input and get nuanced translations tuned for formal, casual, or other styles. Itâ€™s built to help with everyday communication, travel, learning, and professional use.

name: Orca
tagline: The fun way to learn a new language
description: Orca, the fun way to learn a new language. Speak fluently and build confidence with bite-sized lessons built around real-life phrases. Each level teaches 15 everyday expressions, followed by an interactive pronunciation game you must pass to move forward. Challenge other learners, climb the leaderboard, and stay motivated while improving your speaking, listening, and reading skills for real conversations.

name: Flight Follower
tagline: Ad free flight tracking for aviation enthusiasts
description: Free real-time flight tracker for iOS. Identify aircraft overhead with Siri, view live flight status, track planes with native widgets, and explore a fast ADS-B map. Built for avgeeks by an avgeek.

name: Waylight for macOS
tagline: ChatGPT, but with context from your tabs, meetings, and docs
description: Waylight is now available on Apple Silicon Macs! That includes all Macs and MacBooks made after 2020, and some made in 2020. Waylight is an AI assistant that understands everything you do on your computer â€” your meetings, documents, tabs, and messages. It builds a private memory of your activity so you can ask questions about anything youâ€™ve seen and get instant, accurate answers. Waylight organizes your life, automatically generating a to-do list and daily journal based on your activity.

name: LocalMark Studio
tagline: A fast, local-first Markdown editor for real work.
description: LocalMark Studio is a local-first Markdown editor designed for speed and privacy. Whatâ€™s special here? Local-first storage: your notes live in your browser (IndexedDB). Real file tree: create folders + files, rename, delete. Command palette: press âŒ˜â‡§P (Mac) / Ctrlâ‡§P (Windows/Linux). Smart paste: paste rich HTML and get clean Markdown. Live preview: split-pane preview with scroll sync. Extras: optional Mermaid diagrams + KaTeX math.

name: dibma / Joki Strava
tagline: Fake your runs and flex on Strava
description: Create realistic fake running activities for Strava with Dibma. Draw custom routes, control pace and heart rate, then export FIT files for fun, tests, or content.

name: Festiveo
tagline: Discover festivals, plan your trips, and never miss a beat
description: Hey Product Hunt! ðŸŽµ We built Festiveo to make festival season stress-free. Browse upcoming festivals, see lineups, track your favorite artists, and get insider tips. Whether youâ€™re a festival newbie or a veteran, Festiveo helps you find your vibe and plan your experience from start to finish. Check it out: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/festiveo/id6755355854

name: Design in Figma using Cursor Agent + MCP
tagline: Design automation in Figma using AI and natural language
description: Connect your AI assistant to Figma through MCP. Create designs, update layers, and manage components directly from Cursor. Real-time bidirectional sync between your code and Figma designs.

name: ADB Wrench
tagline: ADB in your browser + AI assistant with no install required
description: Browser-based ADB tool via WebUSB. No SDK, no drivers, no install â€“ just plug in and debug. Includes an AI assistant that runs ADB commands from plain English. BYOK (bring your own API key), zero tracking. Features: shell, logcat, file browser, app manager, screenshots, performance monitoring, and more. Everything runs client-side.

name: Clodo
tagline: Execute outbound at the speed of thought.
description: Clodo is Vibe GTM. Find high-intent B2B buyers with a single prompt. Clodo consolidates real-time signals from across the web, enriches contacts, and runs tasteful, fully personalized outboundâ€”no templates, no AI fluff. Just outbound that converts. (Clean, scannable, perfect for PH feed + mobile preview)

name: Lekh AI
tagline: Private, offline AI for iPhone, and iPad
description: Lekh AI is a native iPhone, iPad, and Mac app that runs powerful AI entirely onâ€‘device. No cloud APIs, no subscriptions, and no data leaving your phone. It combines LLM chat, vision, PDF/document analysis, image generation, and voice in one offline assistant. Chat with models like Gemma, Qwen, Llama, Phi, Mistral, OpenELM Voice chat with Kokoro TTS No subscriptions. Oneâ€‘time $2. 100% private. If youâ€™re curious about what onâ€‘device AI can do in 2026, this is it. ðŸš€

name: Duckeebs Swapkey
tagline: Preview your keycap + keyboard combos
description: Ever wondered how a keycap set would actually look on your board before dropping $150 on a GB? We built a tool for that. SwapKey on Duckeebs lets you mix and match keyboards and keycaps to see real-time mockups. Pick a board, swap in different sets, and see what works before you commit.

name: Vocably (a language-learning tool)
tagline: AI-powered cross-platform dictionary and learning system.
description: In the past 3 years (after the first launch), Vocably became smarter (thanks to AI), released as iOS and Android apps (and 90+ new versions on those apps), became available not only as Chrome, but also Safari, and iOS Safari extension (Firefox is coming), and became a more engaging learning tool with various quizzes and questions.

name: Serro (Early Access)
tagline: Temporal knowledge graphs for fast moving engineering teams
description: Teams are coding faster than ever, and context sharing has become a real bottleneck. Serro serves fast-paced engineering teams by helping them start harnessing the power of their temporal techno-organizational knowledge graphs. Meetings to prompts. Code to reports. Proactive context, automated rollups, and a 10x ROI on coordination overhead. Join our waitlist to lock in an early-bird discount.

name: Contactful.app
tagline: Your LinkedIn Relationship Memory
description: Contactful turns LinkedIn into your relationship memory. Save profiles in one click, add tags and notes, and move people through custom pipelines for recruiting, sales or networking. No more lost contacts, messy spreadsheets or forgotten follow-ups. Local-first, privacy-friendly and built for founders, recruiters and sales teams who want to turn connections into real opportunities, build pipelines and close more deals from LinkedIn every week.
